Class ModelHelper

java.lang.Object
  simgrideclipseplugin.model.ModelHelper

public final class ModelHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Help to access WST internal model and hide it to avoid restriction warnings

getGatewayRouterId

public static java.lang.String getGatewayRouterId(org.w3c.dom.Element node)
return the gateway router id according to the node type or null

Parameters:
node - contains the router. Works for different node type :
  • CLUSTER
  • PEER
  • AS (if it contains only one router)
  • ROUTER
Returns:
See Also:
ElementList to find the node types
